content: a beautiful lace wedding garter crochet pattern made to match my wrapped in lace choker and fingerless gloves it now comes in 4 sizes and includes notes on adjusting it further ***this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website below or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf *** **materials needed ** 1 5mm hook 75-150 yards #10 crochet thread in ecru natural white or color of your choice yarn needle scissors 1 yd sewing thread sewing needle 1 yd 1/2 ruched elastic band you may substitute another type of elastic band here 12 satin ribbon in color of your choice pearl bead **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet 3dc cluster = dc3tog in same stitch **gauge ** 31 stitches in 4 **measurements ** xs-s 18 around before elastic band is added m 20 ½ around before elastic band is added l 23 around before elastic band is added xl 25 ½ before elastic band is added see additional notes for increasing the size further **additional notes ** -you may substitute ribbon for the elastic band if you prefer -this garter fits up to a 18 leg measuring circumference 1 above the knee as written -pattern may be made larger see pattern notes for more details
